app_descript:
Voice Pitch Analyzer

Brief: The Voice Pitch Analyzer app is a user-friendly tool designed to help individuals who wish to monitor and improve their vocal pitch over time. It is especially useful for voice training, whether for professional speech therapy, singing, or personal interest in measuring the tonal quality of your voice.

Price: The Voice Pitch Analyzer is a free-to-use app, with the option of supporting the developers through Patreon for improved features and ongoing development. Note that there may be limitations or featured content available exclusively to supporters. ğŸ’µ
